Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small ZinbielAlgebra AllSmallZinbielAlgebra is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic ZinbielAlgebra of orders 2 to 3.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallZinbielAlgebra">
The output zinbielalgebra are represented by its operation table for +, *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small ZinbielAlgebra
"IsASmallZinbielAlgebra" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic ZinbielAlgebra of orders 2 to 3. It returns true if the model is a Small ZinbielAlgebra, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallZinbielAlgebra">
